text: This course is totally free and anyone who wants to learn JavaScript can learn in from here. You may ask, why this course is free? Well, first of all, today JavaScript is widely used programming languages and as StackOverflow states, in 2020 67% of programmers know this language
description: So, in this course you will learn the basics such as, Variable types, Loops and Conditions. In the next part of the course, you will dive into arrays and object. One thing to notice, arrays and objects are very crucial in JavaScript, almost everytime you will use objects and arrays, so learn hard!
